welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hosbach, Germany! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of our city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that Hosbach has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: A luxurious terminal for VIP and private flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer and more modern terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with unlimited access.
